body_html:
There was a set(INTEL_ROOT_DEFAULT "C:/Program Files (x86)/IntelSWTools/compilers_and_libraries/windows") in FindMKL.cmake for Windows.

After the commit, Linux path /opt/intel is still there but the Windows version got removed.
body_text:
There was a set(INTEL_ROOT_DEFAULT "C:/Program Files (x86)/IntelSWTools/compilers_and_libraries/windows") in FindMKL.cmake for Windows.
After the commit, Linux path /opt/intel is still there but the Windows version got removed.
body:
There was a `set(INTEL_ROOT_DEFAULT "C:/Program Files (x86)/IntelSWTools/compilers_and_libraries/windows")` in `FindMKL.cmake` for Windows.

After the commit, Linux path `/opt/intel` is still there but the Windows version got removed.
